transcript: Charlie was pretty adamant about this he said I've never seen somebody whose life was better by including drugs and alcohol in them and so it's like well what were the things that I would do to destroy my life well if I got really into drugs and really into alcohol that would be something that would absolutely destroy my life and so he inverted that and said well then I just won't do this he thought about a lot of things in that way and I think his kind of snarky demeanor or his boyish charm was what everyone kind of loved him for he would State these obvious truths in ways that people hadn't said before and made people feel ridiculous for some of the things that they were already doing
